item.title: CVE-2024-49265|2024-10-16T15:33:21.286Z -- partnerships%20at%20booking.com -- booking.com%20banner%20creator
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Partnerships at Booking.Com Booking.Com Banner Creator allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Booking.Com Banner Creator: from n/a through 1.4.6.
